content:
Here is the response from the user's perspective:

The set construction on Sundays is usually from 2 pm to 5 pm, and volunteering at the box office is from 5 pm to 8 pm on Fridays. And yes, I have a script reading session with the cast on April 12th at the director's house, but I'm not sure what time it is yet. Can you remind me to check with the director about the time?
